# HGUTheme

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Unofficial ggplot2 themes using the colour palette of the MRC HGU logo.

## Installation

You can install the development version of HGUTheme from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hwarden162/HGUTheme")
```

## Colour Codes

Dark Blue: #2D2E5F
Mid Blue: #3A88A9
Light Blue: #54BBD2
